pageOptions.headline: Privacy Policy of Locana app.
pageOptions.subHeading: We will not, without your permission, collect, sell, publish or share information you entrust to us that identifies you or any person.

collected.why: We access to location information only for geotagging your photos.
moreInfo: Current locations are used to geotagging. This feature is turned off as default; works only with your preferrence. We never send any location info or geotagged files to anywhere from your phone or PC even in debug logging mode.

collected.why: We access to users photo or movie only to show in Locana app.
moreInfo: User files are files containing your content, such as photos, or video. We use them only for displaying on Locana app; we never send any data to anywhere from your phone or PC even in debug logging mode.

notCollected.why: We do not collect or share this.
moreInfo: Financial information includes your credit, bank, tax, and other financial data you use to stay productive.

notCollected.why: We do not collect or share this.
moreInfo: Contact Information includes your address, phone, email, and other contact information you use to communicate.

notCollected.why: We do not collect or share this.
moreInfo: Biometrics includes your physical information such as fingerprints, facial recognition, signatures, and voice.

notCollected.why: We do not collect or share this.
moreInfo: Browser history is a list of websites you visit.

notCollected.why: We do not collect or share this.
moreInfo: Phone or text logs are calls or texts you make or receive.

notCollected.why: We do not collect or share this.
moreInfo: Health, medical, or therapy information includes your health claims and information you use to measure health and wellness.
We share information with government entities only when required by law or expressly permitted in an emergency.

notShared.why: We do not collect or share your personal information with them.
We do not collect or share your personal information with them.
moreInfo: Ad networks display ads to you through apps.

notShared.why: We do not collect or share your personal information with them.
moreInfo: Consumer data resellers sell consumer information to other companies for multiple purposes.

notShared.why: We do not collect or share your personal information with them.
moreInfo: Data analytics providers collect and analyze your data.

notShared.why: We do not collect or share your personal information with them.
moreInfo: Operating systems and platforms are companies that power devices and app stores.

notShared.why: We do not collect or share your personal information with them.
moreInfo: Other apps are apps are other companies you may not currently interact with.

notShared.why: We do not collect or share your personal information with them.
moreInfo: Social networks are companies that connect individuals around common interests and facilitate sharing.
